summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to remit the local improvement assessment levied against a portion of Lot Six (6), Block Fifty-four (54), supplemental plat of Pontius' Second Addition to the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 9952, which assessment was levied to pay for the laying off, extending, widening and establishing of Boylston Avenue North and certain other streets and avenues therein named.
